Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams
The showdown between Shohei Ohtani and the San Diego Padres was highly anticipated
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the third post-season matchup between the two clubs in the past five years, with the Dodgers sweeping San Diego in 2020 before the Padres flipped the script in the 2022 NLDS
Others: The Dodgers and Padres had an 8-5 season series with the Padres outscoring the Dodgers 62-56
